[RailOneWayRoadIntersectionSolutions]
;
; straight road, straight rail
rot0=0x00020002,0x02000200,0x09310100,0,0
rot1=0x02000200,0x00020002,0x09310100,1,0
;
; straight road, diagonal rail
rot0flip0=0x00030100,0x02000200,0x09310200,0,0
rot1flip0=0x03010000,0x00020002,0x09310200,1,0
rot2flip0=0x01000003,0x02000200,0x09310200,2,0
rot3flip0=0x00000301,0x00020002,0x09310200,3,0
rot0flip1=0x00000301,0x02000200,0x09310200,0,1
rot1flip1=0x01000003,0x00020002,0x09310200,1,1
rot2flip1=0x03010000,0x02000200,0x09310200,2,1
rot3flip1=0x00030100,0x00020002,0x09310200,3,1
;		  
; diagonalight rail road, stra
rot0flip0=0x02000200,0x00000301,0x09320100,0,0
rot1flip0=0x00020002,0x00030100,0x09320100,1,0
rot2flip0=0x02000200,0x03010000,0x09320100,2,0
rot3flip0=0x00020002,0x01000003,0x09320100,3,0
rot0flip1=0x02000200,0x00030100,0x09320100,0,1
rot1flip1=0x00020002,0x00000301,0x09320100,1,1
rot2flip1=0x02000200,0x01000003,0x09320100,2,1
rot3flip1=0x00020002,0x03010000,0x09320100,3,1
;		  
; diagonalonal rail ( road, diagcase 1)
rot0flip0=0x00030100,0x03010000,0x09320200,0,0
rot1flip0=0x03010000,0x01000003,0x09320200,1,0
rot2flip0=0x01000003,0x00000301,0x09320200,2,0
rot3flip0=0x00000301,0x00030100,0x09320200,3,0
rot0flip1=0x00000301,0x01000003,0x09320300,3,0
rot1flip1=0x01000003,0x03010000,0x09320300,2,0
rot2flip1=0x03010000,0x00030100,0x09320300,1,0
rot3flip1=0x00030100,0x00000301,0x09320300,0,0
;
;
; Added 071904 ~ Tropod
; double diagonal rail, straight onewayroad
TYPE1=0x01030103,0x02000200,0x5F332900,0,0
TYPE2=0x03010301,0x00020002,0x5F332900,1,0
TYPE3=0x03010301,0x02000200,0x5F332900,0,1
TYPE4=0x01030103,0x00020002,0x5F332900,3,1
;Update 062205 ~ Tropod
;rail orthogonal, onewayroad double diagonal
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x03010301,0x5F372300,0,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x01030103,0x5F372300,1,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x01030103,0x5F372300,0,1
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x03010301,0x5F372300,3,1
;rail double diagonal, double diagonal onewayroad
TYPE1=0x01030103,0x03010301,0x5F372200,0,0
TYPE2=0x03010301,0x01030103,0x5F372200,1,0
;rail double diagonal, diagonal onewayroad
TYPE1=0x01030103,0x00000301,0x5F372100,0,0
TYPE2=0x03010301,0x00030100,0x5F372100,1,0
TYPE3=0x01030103,0x03010000,0x5F372100,2,0
TYPE4=0x03010301,0x01000003,0x5F372100,3,0
;rail diagonal, onewayroad double diagonal
TYPE1=0x01000003,0x03010301,0x5F371E00,0,0
TYPE2=0x00000301,0x01030103,0x5F371E00,1,0
TYPE3=0x00030100,0x03010301,0x5F371E00,2,0
TYPE4=0x03010000,0x01030103,0x5F371E00,3,0
;
;
;Added 05042008 ~ Tarkus
;--draggable OWR-3--
TYPE1=0x00010100,0x02000200,0x51040000,2,0
TYPE2=0x01010000,0x00020002,0x51040000,3,0
TYPE3=0x01000001,0x02000200,0x51040000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000101,0x00020002,0x51040000,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for OWR-3
TYPE1=0x00010100,0x02000000,0x51040000,2,0
TYPE2=0x01010000,0x00000002,0x51040000,3,0
TYPE3=0x01000001,0x00000200,0x51040000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000101,0x00020000,0x51040000,1,0

;;Added 05042008 ~ Tarkus
;;--draggable OWR-1-- rebased to Road ~ memo

;TYPE4=0x00000303,0x00020002,0x51030000,1,0

;TYPE2=0x03030000,0x00000002,0x51030000,3,0
;TYPE3=0x03000003,0x00000200,0x51030000,0,0
;TYPE4=0x00000303,0x00020000,0x51030000,1,0

;--draggable Diagonal OWR-1--
TYPE1=0x02020000,0x03010000,0x51030200,0,0
TYPE2=0x02000002,0x01000003,0x51030200,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000202,0x00000301,0x51030200,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020200,0x00030100,0x51030200,3,0
;duplicates disabled ~ memo
;TYPE5=0x02000002,0x01000003,0x51030200,0,1
;TYPE6=0x00000202,0x00000301,0x51030200,3,1
;TYPE7=0x00020200,0x00030100,0x51030200,2,1
;TYPE8=0x02020000,0x03010000,0x51030200,1,1

;--draggable Diagonal OWR-3

;Legacy code, to be removed or repurposed ~ memo
;OWR-HT Top
TYPE1=0x00000400,0x02000200,0x5C070200,0,0

TYPE3=0x04000000,0x02000200,0x5C070200,2,0
